thread.title: 7 Little Things That Can Help You Be A Kinder Person

title: 7 Little Things That Can Help You Be A Kinder Person
text:
facebook 
In a perfect situation, kindness can make the world go round. But only if enough of us gave it a shot, regularly. Being kind doesn't mean you have to do anything huge or grand (unless you have the ability to), but even small gestures can make a big difference. All it takes is a tiny bit of effort. So do your bit this week, by being a little kinder in these seven ways. Show your family some love on Sunday, whether just by spending time with them at home, or treating them to a surprise day out Spread some much needed cheer at work and help your colleagues beat those Monday blues Be a kind commuter on the bus or train, and offer your seat to someone more in need of it Everyone needs some mid-week cheer, so make it a point to smile on Wednesday Appreciate your boo, or your friend, or someone who you would like to show some love to, with a sweet handwritten note on Thursday Share your food with someone in need, or just a fellow hungry friend or colleague, on Friday Use Saturday to visit an animal shelter and help out Image credit: Thinkstock/Getty Images, Pexels
